article.title: NCI Informatics Technology for Cancer Research (ITCR) Annual Meeting 2018
article.content:
Galaxy had a large presence at the 2018 Informatics Technology for Cancer Research (ITCR) meeting:

Topic Authors
Trinity: Transcriptome Assembly for Genetic and Functional Analysis of Cancer Brian Haas
A Galaxy-Based Multi-Omic Informatics Hub for Cancer Researchers Timothy Griffin, Pratik Jagtap
Informatics Tools for High-Throughput Analysis of Cancer Mutations Rachel Karchin
P20: Trinity: Transcriptome assembly for genetic and functional analysis of cancer Brian Haas, Asma Bankapur, Christophe Georgescu, Vrushali Fangal, Carrie Ganote, Cicada Brokaw, Thomas Doak, Aviv Regev
P32: A Galaxy-Based Multi-Omic Informatics Hub for Cancer Researchers Timothy Griffin, Pratik Jagtap
P33: Informatics Tools for High-Throughput Analysis of Cancer Mutations Rachel Karchin, Michael Ryan
